meanings.definition: A wicked or malevolent person or spirit.
meanings.sent1: The devils in the haunted house scared me.
meanings.sent2: She believed that the devils were responsible for the bad things happening.
meanings.sent3: The devils played a prank on the unsuspecting villagers.
meanings.sent4: The devils of greed and envy lurked in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The devils whispered temptations in her ear, urging her to do wrong.

meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express annoyance or surprise.
meanings.sent1: Oh devils! I forgot my keys at home.
meanings.sent3: Devils! I can't believe I missed the bus again.
meanings.sent4: The sudden rain caught me off guard - devils!
meanings.sent5: Devils! Why does this always happen to me?
